title: Testsuite timeout is too small for slow systems

labels.name: build
labels.description: Issues caused by or requiring changes to the build system (scripts or Docker image)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
The testsuite fails due to timeout on the PandaBoard (armv7).

I was able to successfully run the testsuite with timeout patched out:

``` diff
-       runPrint("go", "test", "-short", "-timeout", "10s", pkg)
+       runPrint("go", "test", "-short", pkg)
```

And got this log:

```
?       github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/stevents     [no test files]
?       github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/stindex      [no test files]
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/cmd/syncthing    0.151s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/auto    0.503s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/beacon  0.023s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/config  0.093s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/discover        0.013s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/events  0.787s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/files   2.519s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/fnmatch 0.038s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/ignore  0.056s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/lamport 0.019s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/luhn    0.018s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/model   1.079s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/osutil  0.018s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/protocol        20.597s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/scanner 0.112s
?       github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/stats   [no test files]
?       github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/symlinks        [no test files]
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/upgrade 0.025s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/upnp    0.031s
ok      github.com/syncthing/syncthing/internal/versioner       0.023s
```

The protocol test takes 20sec and exceeds the timeout.
As the pandaboard is one of the faster ARM devices (raspberry is much slower), the timeout would need to be greatly increased - or even removed - to reliably prevent hitting that timeout.
